channel.title: Dread Legion [24/7; Hub; Factions; Freebuild; And More!] mc.dreadlegion.net
channel.description:
[FONT="Impact"][SIZE="7"]Dread Legion[/SIZE][/FONT] Welcome to Dread Legion. We are a a community oriented Minecraft server looking to make the best experience for you, the player. If it weren't for the players, Dread Legion wouldn't be what it is. We have the best admins available, waiting to help you in any way you can. Whether you want to be alone and be the hunter, or join together and become a server wide faction power, all of the options are available for you. Join today to see why people are calling us the best server available!
[COLOR="Blue"]-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-[SIZE="5"]Voting[/SIZE]-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o[/COLOR] Vote at [url=http://www.dreadlegion.net/vote]http://www.dreadlegion.net/vote[/url] for amazing in-game rewards (must be on the Factions server for it to work)
[SIZE="4"]Join Today:[/SIZE] [COLOR="Navy"]mc.dreadlegion.net [/COLOR]
